info.title: TicketHive API
info.description: TicketHive is a robust platform for event ticket management, providing secure authentication, user management, and seamless event operations. This API enables integration with TicketHive's core features, supporting both internal and third-party applications.

post.description: Create a new user account with the provided registration information.
Authenticate user and return a JWT token.
Generate a new refresh token for the authenticated user.

get.description: Verify user's email using the provided token.

post.description: Create a new event with the provided event information.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific event.

put.description: Update an existing event with new information.

delete.description: Permanently delete an event. Only allowed if no tickets exist.

get.description: Retrieve events with pagination and filtering options.

patch.description: Publish an event to make it publicly available.

post.description: Create a new ticket with the provided ticket information.

get.description: Retrieve tickets with pagination, filtering, and sorting options.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific ticket.

put.description: Update an existing ticket with new information.

delete.description: Permanently delete a ticket. Only allowed if no sales exist.

get.description: Retrieve all tickets for a specific event.

patch.description: Deactivate a ticket to stop sales while preserving existing data.

get.description: Get the profile information of the authenticated user.

patch.description: Update the profile information of the authenticated user.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the client making the request

userAgent.description: The User-Agent string of the client making the request

deviceFingerprint.description: An optional device fingerprint to uniquely identify the device
